name: Sliding-menu-css
body:
Sliding-Menu-CSS ================

How to use:

Coming Soon.... :) Simple SASS menu that slides from the side to show the menu options. ![alt tag](https://github.com/jycr753/Sliding-Menu-CSS/blob/master/image_white.png) Browser | Support ------------- | ------------- |Chrome 38 | True | |Safari 7 | Sort of | |Firefox | True | |IE < 10 | False |
